ComicInfo.Summary:
Neverland is at war! As Skye tries to help Belle gather forces to fight back the invasion from Wonderland, the long forgotten tribes of Neverland are called to arms to help defend the realm they call home. Will they be enough to stop the carnage coming their way or will the realm of madness' secret weapon be too much for them all to handle?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Michael DiPascale & Sanju Nivangune | 3 | D | Cover D | Jules Abrera & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | Secret Exclusive Variant Cover | Keith Garvey | Missing | F | VIP Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Sun Khamunaki | Missing |
